Blog.post: hehe.. todae go out wif mabeline yanshen n kokwei in the afternoon.. den after tat i went to mit huiqing..xiao hu zi.. zul n ah ming.. we go watch the day after tomolo.. hhahaha.. quite a nice show.. hmmm.. hehehe.. now i think.. mi n bear be hi-bye fren better.. cos now i dun reali like to be wif her cos of someone... just dun like.. dunno why.. haix.. go out still can.. but in school i just dun like to be wif her bahx.. dunno.. huiqing.. i rather not so close to her.. i rather to haf the sec 2 huiqing.. she get wat i mean.. haix.. i also dunno.. now the huiqing i noe is someone who always late or no come school de.. haix.. so sad.. so lonely in school.. no one to accompany mi play n tok.. esp.she nv come.. i damn sianx.. haix.. she always the one who entertain mi de.. but now seldom le.. hmmm..dunno.. sianx lor.. maybe life jus like tat.. hmmm.. now i'm wif them .. just feel so weird.. beri extra.. haix.. maybe they may think i think too much liao or think too far.. but no lor.. i never.. when they were mi .. they will noe.. haha..anyway.. just let it be.. just like tat contiue to live lor.. i also not god can do mani things.. everyone sure make mistakes.. hmmm.. when mabel there she dun treat mi exist.. she not there.. den i exist.. a spare or wat.. need things den find mi no need just forget it.. alamakx.. dunno wat to sae them lor.. also dun haf the rights to say much things.. hmmm.. sianx.. dun tok about them liao.. *[g|f up]*.. wat i care for her.. i dun think worth it liao.. i reali hope i haf the sec 2 hq .. haix.. hope she reali tryin the beri best bahx.. hehehe.. aniway.. now i reali wan to get everything out of my mind n be a hapi person.. heheheh.. =)all the best wor.. huiqing if u are readin this.. i wish u all the best n i hope u try ur beri best to cum skool on time.. just wanna tell u how much i love u as my laopo.. okie.. take care.. =)

hmmm.. todae kana attach to work at great world macdonald.. there actualli not bad.. but at nite.. wah piangz.. suckx sia.. for no reason i kana scold sia.. haix.. manager nv see properly.. den scold mi.. i tok back sia.. cos not moi fault ma.. i work from 2-10pm.. so tired.. i after work i go to my own work place .. lucky plaza mac.. there the best manx.. i like the most... hahahha.. den reach there around 10.45 like tat.. hmmm.. hahahha.. todae guo de hai not bad lorx.. hahha.. kinda hapi.. also quite angry.. hehehe.. i now onli noe i beri fan in moi heartx.. no one noes.. wat for tellin others when they are hapi.. dun wanna spoil their daes manx.. i decided to avoid as much as i can.. tok less.. n i wont be the same liao.. hmm.. now i will be wat i'm goin to be.. do wat i wanna to do.. say wat i wan to say.. avoid wat i should avoid.. hahhaha.. =PpPp.. anyway.. i hope evrything goin to be smooth..=) smiLex aLwaySs.. *can someone tell mi how to forget someone u like?? i reali wanna noe.. haix..lovin someone.. is a beri cham thingy u noe.. haix.. anyway.. everyone haf different kind of love life.. everyone need to face its own difficulties... hmm.. haix.. dunno how sia.. moi heart break liaox.. hmmm.. how? happiness is in our own hands.. tell the person who u love/like.. u love him/her.. before they are gone.. no one knows what will happen the next dae.. cherish everything u haf now.. if not u will regret de.. hmmmm...

so tired.. haix.. just reach home wor.. hahaha.. todae actualli is a hapi dae... but jus now workin.. damn it.. beri dulan lor.. is like i go take cups.. den may off the light close the door.. den i scare dark ma.. so i quickly open the door.. too fast that i kana my right hand middle finger *[sWay]*.. this one never mind.. after tat.. dunno which two idiot keep sae mi.. sae i angry cos they ok liao.. but no lor.. it the past tat i like him lor.. why must they keep sae when it already the past.. not mine mean not mine ma.. kaox..they jus simply dun understand how i feel lor.. kaox.. angry till wanna cry lor... tat the reason why i diam diam (keep quiet).. dun wanna tok at all.. den beri fan lor .. haix.. wanna let go everything n let it be the history.. but how ?? i already tryin my beri best to forget alot of things liao.. reali.. tryin to be hapi.. laughin n playin like i use to play wif them.. but after todae .. i dun think i can liaox.. i already goin to gif up le.. i sick and tired of all this liao.. haix.. wat am i goin to do ?? i noe too mani things which they dunno.. i never tell out how i feel.. how i think.. no.. never.. no point tellin when i noe in the end wat i get is quarrel..i dun wan to lor.. haix..how am i goin to face it ?? how?? wat past is past liao.. i reali dun wish to think or talk about it..haix.. time is wat i need.. hope i can haf a brain wash sia..reali hope.. den just now after work go st georges' there makan wif huiqing.. in the bus we tok tok tok to makan place there.. got angry thingy.. good n bad thingy.. hahaha.. she reach there afetr we makan.. we tok tok tok.. till 1.30am.. she make mi laugh sia.. she told mi alot of things which i noe n i dunno.. hahah.. thanks god she there wif mi.. if not i ki siao beri soon.. hmmm.. now i noe lots of things liao.. n i noe wat i should do le.. hmmm.. i should avoid wat i should avoid.. do wat i should do.. forget wat i should forget.. think wat i should think.. hahaha.. tok to who i should tok .. is the way how u treat mi n i shall treat u how u treat mi le.. everyone haf its own limits.. tahan till cannot tahan sure explosion de.. hahaha.. hope i can get back to last time as soon as possible.. reali.. haix.. [n0 0ne i5 perfeC+][h0p|n t4t th3 d4e wi|| c0me s00n].. haix.. *[de4d]*.. i will not be the same anymore.. realli.. hmmm... haix..

hmmm.. yesterdae nite wanna write de but de den too tired liao.. hahaha.. yesterdae work so funni..may cannot find nuggets and mac wings.. but it just simply in front of her nia... pat jiao =XxX.. hahaha... huiqing at work ki siao.. keep laugh laugh laugh.. dunno what happen to her.. sure nv eat medicine.. hahahahha.. mi finali at work can play n laugh liao.. hehehe.. they dunno wat happen.. yesterdae they nv tok to each other.. hope they are fine.. nothing happen .. hmmm..a bit dulan yesterdae.. manager gif attitude.. sae cannot bring personnal thingy to work.. but den he himself bring.. so i dun gif a damn just gif back how he treat mi.. hahaha but after makan.. okie liao.. hahaha... later still got work.. sianx.. beri tired.. den tomolo attach to great world.. diaOx siA.. scary leh.. everytime kana attached.. kaox.. anyway.. i also cannot do anything ma... hahahaha..hope later haf a good time sia.. hahaha.. =)

kaox.. i fail by few marks onli lor.. haix.. so sway.. my english pull my marks down sia.. haix.. i die liao la..somemore still got food and nutrition sia..so cham.. haix.. i dun like food and nutrition..beri zi bi liao.. haix.. i now alone at home so sianx.. no one tok or play wif mi.. haix...=( dun tok about result liao.. cos is the past liao..i must try to work hard for my final year de liao.. todae so mani people no come school sia.. so sianz.. dun feel like goin but no mc sia.. so mafan..haix.. i realise i start to haf feelin for him le..but should i tell him ?? i dun dare.. haix.. i dun think i will tell bahx.. need time to think lor.. i now goin to become crazy liao.. beri sianz.. how?? haix.. no one now understand mi lorx.. how am i goin to tell them how i reali feel..? haix.. i feelin beri stress lorx.. is beri beri beri stress.. alot of things in my heart n mind..tat i wanna to let it off .. haix... reali.. haix.. reali no mood~!! haixXx.. =( sObx sObx

hahaha.. awhile more goin to get result liao.. mit parents session.. die liao... sure cannot live de.. kana nag nag nag de.. 100% plus chOP~!!! hahahha... pray hard will pass lor.. teacher will tok less can liao.. if not .. hahhahha.. mati lor.. hmmmm.. ytd he sms mi.. but i think for beri long wanna reply anot.. in the end i did.. to console him.. he is feelin fan and dunno wat lor.. hahaha.. i also dunno wat to do sia.. leave it behind lor.. i sae b4 liao.. i wanna be the hapi go lucky eunice.. no more fan nan de..hahhaha.. i think for beri long le.. i make my final final decision le.. hahaha... sianx... at nite den write bahx.. hahaha.. cos goin out soon liao.. *w|nKx* ..

moi mummy go hospital.. beri scare.. worry for her sia.. haix.. hmmm... pray hard she fine.. cos think onli check up.. hmmm.. hehehe.. forget someone may take a beri long time.. but sure there will be a dae will forget de.. hahaha..now i dun wanna care so much liao.. no point for mi to care so much sia.. hahaha.. cos .. it useless ma.. hahaha.. aniway.. i try my very best to be hapi lor.. being in the past is still the best..hahaha.. tis few daes i will "zi bi" sia.. no one accompany mi sia.. jie oversea.. mum hospitalise.. daddy workin.. d|aOx.. hahahaha...=) todae evenin go back to school to see the talent quest.. den damn fark lor..actualli got fun.. but angry.. kaox.. but i think n think not worth for mi angry.. cos they dun care y should i lehx?? i still haf others ma.. they are not onli the one for mi.. they just treat mi not there.. need mi den find mi.. diaOx.. be frenx be till like tat.. bang wall better la.. hahaha.. anyway.. they become more n more got AP sia.. anyway.. hope everything will go on smoothly bahz.. hahahaha... =)yesterdae is a history.. tml is a mystery.. todae is a gift.. tat wat we call present.. no one perfect.. cherish everyone n everything tat important to u.. b4 it gone.. gone u will regret le.. okie? sMiLeX aLwaYs.. =PpPp

sianz.. now in school havin IT lesson.. haix.. yesterdae after work i went back to my own work place.. so tired..nearli midnite den reach home.. this mornin nearli late for school sia.. haix.. mi still cant be like the past.. i wanna find back the hapi go lucky eunice.. but is beri difficult.. i haf lost of thingy in my heart.. but how am i goin to let it go..?? haix.. i already gif up in mani things.. haix.. how am i goin to face someone who i reali love? i already avoid as much as possible liao.. haix.. but still like that .. thinkin of the past.. the things i haf say.. i haf do.. those people i haf hurt.. those who hurt mi .. quarrels wif frenz in the past.. all my regrets.. how am i goin to amends all the wrongs i haf done? haix.. how ? am i goin to be the past eunice i use to be or the present eunice now when i not hapi at all in my heart ? lots of things i haf to say.. but who noes?no one at all.. i reali wanna noe what reali happenin to mi this few months.. haix.. i miss the past .. which i use to haf lots of fun and times which i use to spend wif all my dearest frenx..laopox..and..baobeix.. haix.. but now.. everything haf change.. everyone haf change.. nothing will be the same like in the past liao.. tat will be all the memories of mine.. everyone do change.. most people cant accept the others change.. but why ? haix.. love do hurt mi alot.. and what is love all about ? what does it mean? i reali dunno wat am i tokin.. doin.. thinkin.. haix.. as long as everyone hapi can liao.. =) being someone what other wan is beri difficult lorx.. just be urself bahx.. i promise i try my best to forget everything that hurt mi lotx.. haix.. i must face the reality.. the fact.. tat they are together liao.. he doesnt belong to mi at all.. he onli a gd fren of mine.. y am i still thinkin .. ? wish them all the best.. no one noe who tat person is.. no point tellin when i'm just an extra bahx.. let nature takes it place bahx.. my heart haf already lost it ways long time ago.. cannot find it back liaox.. it beri beri difficult lorx.. haix... as for my classmates/schoolmates..mabeline..beverly..gina..ginny..yuezhu..imelda..metilda..yinzhi..penny..shilin..huiqing..ellis..jojin.. we haf lots of misunderstandin in the past.. quarrels.. and we went through goods n bads times together.. but i hope now we back again.. i hope we will be happy together.. and haf lots of fun again.. reali.. i hope no more. misunderstandin and quarrels again.. all the best in everything u all do.. =)

life still haf to go go on no matter wat.. life is so meaningless to mi liao.. i'm sick n tired of everything.. why haf it to do wif me when it is not my problem at all.. and wat is love all about anywae..?moi heart break into million thousand hundreds of pieces liao.. n it lost.. cannot cum back animore.. it just disappear.. lovin someone can be so sweet and it can be so painful.. when u love someone .. u are also givin him the rights to hurt u.. but y ?? i just dun understand.. haix.. when u reali like someone will u tell him ? or jus keep quiet? i got lots of things to tell him but i do not haf the courage to do so.. haix.. but i already gif up liao.. so i dun wanna think animore.. i jus hate to think but i just cant stop at all.. makin mi so stress n fan.. sad still haf to act happy infront of frenz.. the feeling sux.. no one understand mi.. no one.. everyone just think i'm someone who is so attitude.. but wat is attitude..? do they noe? they dun.. everyone sure got attitude de lor.. i just dunno wat they thinkin.. being together for so long.. i already try my best to change .. n i did it.. but did anyone realise it?? no one at all.. they dun appreciate it den y should i bother or cares so much ? i'm jus sianz liao.. dunno anithing.. i noe avoid it will be the same.. but does anione noe how i feel ?? haix.. i miss the past n hate the present.. in the past.. all the fun .. i use to haf is gone.. everyone will change into different type of person de.. but is see how those people besides u.. goin to accept it or not.. love hurts alot..y does love exist..? haix.. *sObx* ⒕lucky now.. i still haf my laopos and baobeis.. may,huiqing and peishan.. they are always there for mi when i need someone.. they always make mi laugh n make mi feel like myself.. feel like the way i wanna to be.. may.. someone who noes mi well and we get along beri well.. we do quarrels.. but we still so good..she is the one who always console mi n make mi dun think too much.. she make mi laugh from places to another.. so paisehx..she still got note down how long we haf been together.. when i didnt even notices it at all.. so touch~haha.. i always make her vomit blood as i'm someone who beri difficult to console.. cos i'm stubborn.. i dun bother anyone n anything when i'm fed up.. as for huiqing.. we noe each other for 3 years liao.. we were in the same class last two years.. but arent so good.. cos seldom tok.. but once we are in different class.. we work at the same place.. n we start to get close.. she beri cute n always blur.. ..she noes all moi problemz.. and how i feel.. she dun reali noe how console mi but she can entertain mi when i'm feelin reali down n stress.. hahah.. thankz.. she listen to all moi problems.. and all the naggin.. she couldnt tahan mi at times as i always take her hands and play.. hahaha.. she noe wat i mean.. [chicken wing].. hahaha... peishan.. i noe her since primary four.. we are best frens.. she understands mi well the most.. heheh.. she reali noe how to handle mi.. she a chio bu manz.. hahah.. she a beri beri good listener to mi.. sometimes .. how i hope i can mit her everytime.. to tell her all moi problems.. so mani years past liao.. she always there for mi.. no matter wat she try her best to console mi n make mi happi.. she always the one worry for mi when she also the one i worry for.. she noes mi for so long n knows wat kind of person i am.. in the past we do quarrel.. quarrel until beri cham..but tat the past.. everyone haf change..sorry for all the things i haf done wrong.. now i cherish is wat i haf now wif u all.. reali.. anywae.. i feel so lucky to haf all of u wif mi just by my side.. thankz alot.. *mUaCk*.. *paIsEh*

shan.. no matter wat .. i hope we are like the past.. u just dun think much.. things will just pass.. god just gifin us test.. hope we can pass bahx.. aniwae... smiles always ya.. hahahah.. kkx.. take care wor.. hope things pass as times flies.. wahahhaa.. hmmmm.. tat all.. muackz

sianx.. nowadaes.. things gettin worst.. dunno why n wat to do ? leave it solve it or avoid it ? haix.. mi laopox n peishan not reali on good terms.. haix wat i wanna sae.. peishan.. i see ur bloggy liao.. is not we dun wan treat u as a part of us .. is just tat .. did u reali trust us..?? the friendster tat thingy beri long ago liao.. it for my laopox.. n u r my baobei.. so different..get it ? i dun haf time to make the friendster of the five of us.. u meixiang may huiqing n mi.. when i got the time i will do it.. i promise.. as for on my birthdae.. i didnt noe u r angry.. cos i ask u dun sae.. how u wan mi understand? u think i can read everyone minds? when i ask .. u dun sae.. den how u wan mi to noe? we trust u n care for u .. but in the end.. we noe alot of things.. u may sae u just tell malaysian about the thingy.. but it not just tat.. it lots of things.. we get to noe all the things in the end.. but i was kept in the dark.. if i dun trust u.. y i wanna tell u so mani things? i cherish u may n huiqing.. even though last time i was deeply hurt by u n bleahx bleahx bleahx.. but i already forget it liao.. it the past le.. y should we get the past to disturb our future lehx? i forgive n i try my beri best to forget cos i care.. i cherish.. is not tat i wat.. but i reali trust u all alot.. u all always there for mi when i needed u all.. i appreciate it alot.. n i reali hapi to haf u all by my side.. i noe about u n ur school frenx thingy.. i also wanna to be by ur side.. by we just come from different school.. i wanna transfer.. by my studies is too lan liao.. cannot get in ur school.. anyway hope we can solve this as soon as possible bahx.. hmmm.. tat all i can sae.. more than tat i bo wei gong le.. baobeix laopox darlingx .. no matter wat .. we must go through all the obstacles( dunno how spell la ) n we will be together forever le.. okie? muaCkx.. love ya loTs... rEali..=)

being the youngest in the family for almost 15 yrs.. n now everything haf change.. i haf a younger sister now which not even a month old.. i become sis liao.. cannot believe it.. at first.. i'm hapi to be sis as baby sis is so cute.. but now.. i dun... i feel being neglect by them n they dun discuss anithing wif mi.. they decide le den tell mi.. wat the .. haix.. i dunno also.. i dun like.. i feel so stress up lor.. haix.. i dun tok to my elder sis anymore as they lie to mi.. they dun appreciate wat i do.. they dun care at all.. so why should i bother lehx? so i jus dun care le..wat they do i just return.. i now is a different person le.. no longer the last time mi liaox.. haix.. my life just change.. haix..

this few daes so stress .. stress till i wanna die liao.. haix.. nv show it nia.. this few daes i quite bad temper n attitude.. somemore not enough sleep sia.. kaox.. every mornin so mani children at my house.. so fanx.. somemore so noisy.. pengX.. haix.. dun wanna think so much.. but how.. i reali feel like cryin lor.. but i cant... haix.. i miss alot of things... reali..haix.. wat i can do now is diam diam.. den zi bi zi bi lor.. tat all.. realli haiz..

tis few daes no write cos no time sia.. i every nite beri late reach home.. hahhaha.. if not not at home.. hahah.. beri bad horx? tis few daes.. haix.. lots of thingy happen.. too fan liao.. reali goin ki siao liao.. wat is impossible become possible.. scary.. ahhaha.. but nvm.. i just try to overcome it.. quite fanx.. but i reali dunno wat to sae.. reali dunno how .. hehhe.. every dae work is the best.. make mi busy n make mi dun think much.. hahaha.. =)

todae actualli can be a good n hapi dae for mi.. haix.. but in the end.. it a fuck up dae for mi.. kaox.. damn dulanx.. feel like cryin.. just duno wat reali goin on.. i wanna die liao.. haix..i reali dunno lor.. haix.. why does it haf to do wif me when it already a past of mine.. haix.. beri beri dulanx.. just feel no trust from them at all.. y ? y it like tat ? haix.. wat they gif mi is jus a trustless thingy lor.. maybe they sae i think too much.. but if change to u lehx? u get wat i mean liao.. everything mi lor.. all mi lor.. haix.. fUcK lehx.. haix.. i noe if one dae.. she read tis.. she will ask mi .. haix.. but i reali wanna die liao.. i cannot tahan.. beri stress up lehx.. haix.. really dunno wat to do liao.. i reali change alot liao.. haix.. change to worst lor.. the world n people is changin.. haix.. i gif up le.. i cannot continue the journey liao.. i reali reali cannot liaox.. haix.. =( sObsObx..

hmmm... hahhaa.. my mummi gif birth to a baby ger.. hahaha.. so kawaii.. on 4th of june.. a new born kawaii ger is out.. hahah..i become jie jie liao.. so so so so hapi sia.. hahahah.. hmmmm... haix.. this few daes... lots of thingy in my head sia..somemore so tired~ think think think.. dunno wat to do.. but i do noe one thingy.. i beri angry one guy lor.. gifin attitude when askin him nicely ? den bang wall lor.. since he not tellin the truth wat for i bother.. i trust wat i see.. i dun trust wat he sae lor.. kaox.. haix..it fine wif mi lor.. cos i noe too mani things he still dunno.. wat he sae at my back wat he thinks.. n lots lots.. *pengx* i feel tat i change alots sia.. dunno y.. haix.. hmmm.. sometimes can laugh like siao.. sometimes.. mood swings.. dunno.. now i also dun understand my self.. haix.. wat i can do is find myself back.. i reali will.. i try my best no matter wat.. i noe mi is someone beri stubborn n quite attitude at times.. but now i will change.. like wat i sae.. now i learn to tahan things.. n keep most things to myself.. n i reali did try my beri best lor.. *laopox.. pls xiang xin wo..* once.. there a story of you n mi.. it started happily.. but it ended sadli n terribly.. every story sure haf a startin n endin.. wat i feel most of the times is onli fairy tales endin is the best.. most is happy endin... but in real life.. how do a story reali end happily? i noe in this story of u n mi.. mostly is part of my fault.. i keep everything to myself.. i didn't wan u to worry.. didn't want u get so fan cos of mi... but i failed.. i make u more worry n fan in the end.. sorri..when i tell u things.. u sae dun tell u bout it.. but when i dun.. u sae i didn't tell u.. so confuse.. i gif up cos u alreadi find someone who is more suitable for u.. like wat my laopo sae.. both of us is just stubborn.. i noe i dun reali fight for the things i wan.. but y i must fight for it when i noe i haf lose it in the first place.. i noe is mi who start all this nonsense.. but who wans? i just too stress up.. too mani things happen at once.. nth goes rite for mi.. as long as u r hapi.. it fine wif mi.. not everything belongs to mi or u.. as long as he/she is happi can liao.. haix.. now u r happi again.. i'm relieve.. no more worries.. =) hopin n prayin things will be fine for u..*winkx*..this story just end.. =) heheh.. hopin everything goes rite for mi as soon as possible bahx.. sianx liao.. dun wanna write le.. hehehe.. *sMiLeX*

hmmm.. tat last three daes i was in my school redcross camp.. so nv write.. haix so tired sia.. dyin soon.. hahhha.. i dunno wat i thinkin now.. i onli noe in camp is a torture... this camp not reali fun as my group.. haix.. cannot make it de.. haix... dun tok about camp.. hmmm.. haix.. moi heart is in a mess now.. haix..`~! dunno lehx.. also beri happy.. i become jie jie liao.. on the fourth of june.. hehehe.. the baby so cute.. wahahahah.. reali... hahahha.. become jiejie so hapi.. 1st time..heheheh.. haix.. dun feel like writin.. kkz.. i end here.. *paIsEhx*..

hmmm.. yesterdae went to moi laopo(maY) house stay.. thinkin of the past i haf spent wif my ex.. it hurtx.. like wat he sae.. why i dun wan fight for the things i wan ? but why i must fight for the things i wan when it already doesnt belong to mi ??haix.. now so sickx.. den also dunno wat to do.. beri fan..at moi laopo hse .. i decided to write the LAST letter to moi ex.. n i goin to forget everything liao.. haix.. is tis reali the endin? every story haf it starts n end.. n now i think this story of mine is the end..the first time we know each other.. the first time we mit.. good n bad times we haf.. it all my memories liao.. haix.. thanks for all the memories ..n sori tat i haf hurt u so deep.. sori.. *sobsob* haix.. dunno wat to write le.. wanna haf a peace of mind liao.. jus wanna to be alone..=(

hmmm.. todae go sentosa wif mabeline.. huiqing..metilda..imelda.. edwin..jiajun and jieming..hehehe.. we haf lots of fun.. but i dun reali feel hapi lor.. mani things kept in my heart tat i wanted to sae.. n tell him.. but in the end i decided to gif up le.. at sentosa.. we go to the palawan beach.. den we play.. i tryin my best to laugh n i did it.. but deep down in moi heart.. i'm so fan n i feel like stayin alone one whole dae.. haix..den mi n jiajun swim to the other end.. we dig two big deep holes there.. i told him this.. if i can bury all my problems and unhapi things in this sand.. i reali wan to.. hope to haf a brain wash sia. haix.. i feelin beri beri fan.. how am i goin to let all the thingy out sia..?? my heart haf lost it ways.. n it gone forever.. i reali dunno wat am i thinkin.. sometimes i think of him sometimes i dun.. i reali dunno.. do i still haf feelin for him ? askin myself about tis for a few daes liao.. but my heart jus dun get the feelin rites.. hmmm..haix.. *sTrEsSsSs*wat am i reali thinkin ... can someone tell mi.. n i dun like to a spare lor.. haix.. mi just dun like being in tis place.. haix.. *heArtPaiN* haix.. hwo do i get rid of all this..? how ? happen for so long liao .. n it still like tat ? haix.. dun feel like smilin or laughin but still haf to act it out.. hao tong ku.. haix.. mani people may think i'm hapi but i'm not... just not the eunice.. no more liao.. after so mani things happen... all no more liao.. haix.. I REALLY GIF UP LE~!!! haix..[x|n zhen de zhen de h40 t0ng][h4|x]

on the 10th of july.. 12.38 am.. our story jus started.. i promise u i will cherish this relationship~i be there for u.. i will try my best to accompany u .. no one wanna be hurt anyway.. anyway wat i wanna tell u is.. "dEaR nO mAtTeR wAt haPpEn.. i LoVe u aLwAyS.. "
